front.title: Implementation of a large scale carrier-level VoIP system using P2PSIP

abstract.t: In this draft we introduce practical work for Peer-to-Peer (P2P) SIP system based on DSN, which is a Distributed Service Network proposed by China Mobile in ITU-T as the evolution of NGN. First we give a brief introduction about DSN and DSN VoIP system. We then introduce the measurement for validating the system. Finally we give the conclusion.
